description: Start an asynchronous job to add files from the given View query or folder the userâ€™s download list,

query.description: Results from this view query will be added to the user's download list.  This parameter should be excluded when adding files from a folder.

folderId.description: The synID of a folder to add all of the children from the folder to the user's download list.  This parameter should be excluded when adding files from a query.

useVersionNumber.description: When true (default), the version number will be included for each file added to the user's download list.  When set to false, the version number will be excluded, indicating that the 'current' version should always be downloaded.
